SELECT DISTINCT /* com.daalgae.thymeleafspringboot.board.dao.BoardMapper#selectTotalCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM POST_INFO A
JOIN MEM_INFO B ON(A.MEM_CODE = B.MEM_CODE)
A.POST_TYPE = #{ postType }

AND B.MEM_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
AND A.POST_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
AND A.POST_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')

SELECT DISTINCT /* com.daalgae.thymeleafspringboot.board.dao.BoardMapper#selectBoardList() */ A.POST_CODE , A.POST_SORT , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.POST_DATE , A.POST_COUNT , D.MEM_ID FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT B.POST_CODE , B.POST_SORT , B.POST_TITLE , B.POST_CONTENT , B.POST_DATE , B.REF_POST_WRITER , B.POST_TYPE , B.POST_COUNT FROM POST_INFO B
JOIN MEM_INFO C ON(B.REF_POST_WRITER = C.MEM_CODE)
B.POST_TYPE = #{ postType }
AND B.POST_SORT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
AND C.MEM_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
AND B.POST_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
AND B.POST_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
AND (B.POST_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%') OR B.POST_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%'))
) A JOIN MEM_INFO D ON(A.REF_POST_WRITER = D.MEM_CODE) ORDER BY A.POST_CODE DESC LIMIT #{ startRow }, 10
mapper.update: UPDATE /* com.ohgiraffers.thymeleafspringboot.board.dao.BoardMapper#incrementBoardCount() */ POST_INFO SET POST_COUNT = POST_COUNT + 1 WHERE POST_CODE = #{ no }
mapper.select: SELECT /* com.daalgae.thymeleafspringboot.board.dao.BoardMapper#selectBoardDetail() */ A.POST_CODE , A.POST_SORT , A.POST_TITLE , A.REF_POST_WRITER , B.MEM_ID , A.POST_CONTENT , A.POST_COUNT , A.POST_DATE , C.ATTACH_CODE_SEQ , C.ATTACH_ORIGIN_NAME , C.ATTACH_DB_NAME , C.ATTACH_THUMB_ADDR , C.ATTACH_ORIGIN_ADDR , C.REF_POST_CODE FROM POST_INFO A JOIN MEM_INFO B ON(A.REF_POST_WRITER = B.MEM_CODE) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT_FILE C ON (A.POST_CODE = C.REF_POST_CODE) WHERE A.POST_CODE = #{ no }

SELECT /* com.daalgae.thymeleafspringboot.board.dao.BoardMapper#selectReplyList() */ A.POST_REPLY_CODE , A.REF_POST_CODE , A.POST_REPLY_CONTENT , A.REF_POST_REPLY_WRITER , A.POST_REPLY_DATE , B.MEM_ID FROM POST_REPLY A JOIN MEM_INFO B ON (A.REF_POST_REPLY_WRITER = B.MEM_CODE) WHERE A.REF_POST_CODE = #{ boardNo } ORDER BY A.POST_REPLY_CODE

mapper.select: SELECT /* com.daalgae.thymeleafspringboot.board.dao.BoardMapper#selectThumbnailDetail() */ A.POST_CODE , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.POST_CONTENT , B.MEM_ID , A.POST_DATE , C.ATTACHMENT_NO , C.ATTACH_CODE_SEQ , C.ATTACH_DB_NAME , C.ATTACH_ORIGIN_ADDR , C.ATTACH_THUMB_ADDR FROM POST_INFO A JOIN MEM_INFO B ON (A.MEM_CODE = B.MEM_CODE) JOIN ATTACHMENT_FILE C ON (A.POST_CODE = C.POST_CODE) WHERE A.POST_CODE = #{ no }
